participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and nurturing, enjoys community involvement and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey. i live in a rural farming community. i've a german shepherd dog.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Driven and optimistic, passionate about fitness and helping others achieve their goals.
participant_2.background: i am a cancer survivor. my parents were both very athletic. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach.
